sourcesContent:
<template>
    <el-form inline :model="exportForm">
        <el-form-item label="专业">
            <el-select>
                <el-option v-model="exportForm.major" v-for="item in majorList" :label="item.description"
                    :value="item.major" :key="item.major">
                </el-option>
            </el-select>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="毕业年份">
            <el-date-picker type="year" v-model="exportForm.year" placeholder="选择毕业年份"></el-date-picker>
        </el-form-item>
        <el-form-item label="查询信息数目">
            <el-input-number v-model="exportForm.number" :min="0" :max="max" label="毕业生信息条数"></el-input-number>
        </el-form-item>

    </el-form>
</template>

<script>
import jwtPrase from '@/assets/js/jwtPrase';
export default {
    name: "StudentMsgExportForm",
    data() {
        return {
            exportForm: {
                major: '',
                year: '',
                number: 10,
            },
            //数据最大条数
            max: '',
            majorList: []
        }

    },
    methods: {
        //获取毕业年份选择项

        //获取majorList
        async getMajorList() {
            let college = jwtPrase().college
            const resp = await this.$http.get('/dict/major/college/' + college)
            if (resp.data.code === 200) {
                this.majorList = resp.data.data
                this.majorList.unshift({ major: '0', description: '全部专业' })
            }
        },
        //获取


    },
    created(){
       this.getMajorList()
    }

}

</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
